verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> now כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> But now thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD בֹּרַאֲךָ֣ <WH1254> that created יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> thee O Jacob וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <WH3335> and he that formed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> thee O Israel אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> Fear כִּ֣י <WH3588> for גְאַלְתִּ֔יךָ <WH1350> not for I have redeemed קָרָ֥אתִי <WH7121> thee I have called בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> [thee] by thy name לִי־ אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תַעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> When thou passest through בַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> the waters אִתְּךָ־ <WH854> for אָ֔נִי <WH589> I וּבַנְּהָר֖וֹת <WH5104> I [will be] with thee and through the rivers לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁטְפ֑וּךָ <WH7857> they shall not overflow כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תֵלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> walk בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> through אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> the fire לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תִכָּוֶ֔ה <WH3554> thou shalt not be burned וְלֶהָבָ֖ה <WH3852> neither shall the flame לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor תִבְעַר־ <WH1197> kindle בָּֽךְ׃

כִּ֗י <WH3588> for אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מוֹשִׁיעֶ֑ךָ <WH3467> thy Saviour נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> I gave כָפְרְךָ֙ <WH3724> [for] thy ransom מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> Egypt כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> Ethiopia וּסְבָ֖א <WH5434> and Seba תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH8478> your place

מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you יָקַ֧רְתָּ <WH3365> Since thou wast precious בְעֵינַ֛י <WH5869> in my sight נִכְבַּ֖דְתָּ <WH3513> thou hast been honourable וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> and I אֲהַבְתִּ֑יךָ <WH157> and I have loved וְאֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> thee therefore will I give אָדָם֙ <WH120> men תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <WH8478> your place וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <WH3816> for thee and people תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> exchange נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> for thy life

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> Fear כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִתְּךָ־ <WH854> for אָ֑נִי <WH589> I מִמִּזְרָח֙ <WH4217> from the east אָבִ֣יא <WH935> not for I [am] with thee I will bring זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <WH2233> thy seed וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֖ב <WH4628> thee from the west אֲקַבְּצֶֽךָּ׃ <WH6908> and gather

אֹמַ֤ר <WH559> I will say לַצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> to the north תֵּ֔נִי <WH5414> Give up וּלְתֵימָ֖ן <WH8486> and to the south אַל־ <WH408> not תִּכְלָ֑אִי <WH3607> Keep not back הָבִ֤יאִי <WH935> bring בָנַי֙ <WH1121> my sons מֵרָח֔וֹק <WH7350> from far וּבְנוֹתַ֖י <WH1323> and my daughters מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> from the ends הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> [Even] every one הַנִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> that is called בִשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> by my name וְלִכְבוֹדִ֖י <WH3519> him for my glory בְּרָאתִ֑יו <WH1254> for I have created יְצַרְתִּ֖יו <WH3335> I have formed אַף־ <WH637> even עֲשִׂיתִֽיו׃ <WH6213> him yea I have made

הוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> Bring forth עַם־ <WH5971> people עִוֵּ֖ר <WH5787> the blind וְעֵינַ֣יִם <WH5869> eyes יֵ֑שׁ <WH3426> that have וְחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <WH2795> and the deaf וְאָזְנַ֥יִם <WH241> that have ears לָֽמוֹ׃

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <WH1471> Let all the nations נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> be gathered יַחְדָּ֗ו <WH3162> together וְיֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> be assembled לְאֻמִּ֔ים <WH3816> and let the people מִ֤י <WH4310> Who בָהֶם֙ יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> who among them can declare זֹ֔את <WH2063> to us וְרִֽאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <WH7223> the former יַשְׁמִיעֻ֑נוּ <WH8085> this and shew יִתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> add עֵֽדֵיהֶם֙ <WH5707> their witnesses וְיִצְדָּ֔קוּ <WH6663> that they may be justified וְיִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> or let them hear וְיֹאמְר֥וּ <WH559> and say אֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> [It is] truth

אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> You עֵדַי֙ <WH5707> Ye [are] my witnesses נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעַבְדִּ֖י <WH5650> and my servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom בָּחָ֑רְתִּי <WH977> whom I have chosen לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תֵּ֠דְעוּ <WH3045> that ye may know וְתַאֲמִ֨ינוּ <WH539> and believe לִ֤י וְתָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH995> me and understand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I ה֔וּא <WH1931> I am He לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> that I [am] he before לֹא־ <WH3808> no נ֣וֹצַר <WH3335> formed אֵ֔ל <WH410> me there was no God וְאַחֲרַ֖י <WH310> neither shall there be after לֹ֥א <WH3808> will be none יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become ס
אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> I [even] I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <WH1107> and beside מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> me [there is] no saviour

אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> is I הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <WH5046> I have declared וְהוֹשַׁ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3467> and have saved וְהִשְׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> and I have shewed וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there בָּכֶ֖ם זָ֑ר <WH2114> when [there was] no strange וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you עֵדַ֛י <WH5707> [god] among you therefore ye [are] my witnesses נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַֽאֲנִי־ <WH589> and I אֵֽל׃ <WH410> that I [am] God

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even מִיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> Yea before the day אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I ה֔וּא <WH1931> I am He וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מִיָּדִ֖י <WH3027> out of my hand מַצִּ֑יל <WH5337> [was] I [am] he and [there is] none that can deliver אֶפְעַ֖ל <WH6466> I will work וּמִ֥י <WH4310> and who יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7725> and who shall let ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֧ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD גֹּאַלְכֶ֖ם <WH1350> your redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמַעַנְכֶ֞ם <WH4616> your sake שִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> For your sake I have sent בָבֶ֗לָה <WH894> to Babylon וְהוֹרַדְתִּ֤י <WH3381> and have brought down בָֽרִיחִים֙ <WH1281> all their nobles כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all וְכַשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> and the Chaldeans בָּאֳנִיּ֥וֹת <WH591> [is] in the ships רִנָּתָֽם׃ <WH7440> whose cry
אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD קְדֽוֹשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH6918> your Holy One בּוֹרֵ֥א <WH1254> the creator יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <WH4428> your King ס

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which maketh בַּיָּ֖ם <WH3220> in the sea דָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> a way וּבְמַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters עַזִּ֖ים <WH5794> in the mighty נְתִיבָֽה׃ <WH5410> and a path

הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> Which bringeth forth רֶֽכֶב־ <WH7393> the chariot וָס֖וּס <WH5483> and horse חַ֣יִל <WH2428> the army וְעִזּ֑וּז <WH5808> and the power יַחְדָּ֤ו <WH3162> together יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <WH7901> they shall lie down בַּל־ <WH1077> not יָק֔וּמוּ <WH6965> they shall not rise דָּעֲכ֖וּ <WH1846> they are extinct כַּפִּשְׁתָּ֥ה <WH6594> as tow כָבֽוּ׃ <WH3518> they are quenched
אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּזְכְּר֖וּ <WH2142> Remember רִֽאשֹׁנ֑וֹת <WH7223> ye not the former things וְקַדְמֹנִיּ֖וֹת <WH6931> the things of old אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְבֹּנָֽנוּ׃ <WH995> neither consider

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold עֹשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> Behold I will do חֲדָשָׁה֙ <WH2319> a new thing עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now תִצְמָ֔ח <WH6779> now it shall spring forth הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not תֵֽדָע֑וּהָ <WH3045> shall ye not know אַ֣ף <WH637> will even אָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> it? I will even make בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> in the wilderness דֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> a way בִּֽישִׁמ֖וֹן <WH3452> in the desert נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <WH5104> [and] rivers

תְּכַבְּדֵ֙נִי֙ <WH3513> shall honour חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> The beast הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of the field תַּנִּ֖ים <WH8577> me the dragons וּבְנ֣וֹת <WH1323> first יַֽעֲנָ֑ה <WH3284> and the ostriches כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because נָתַ֨תִּי <WH5414> because I give בַמִּדְבָּ֜ר <WH4057> in the wilderness מַ֗יִם <WH4325> waters נְהָרוֹת֙ <WH5104> [and] rivers בִּֽישִׁימֹ֔ן <WH3452> in the desert לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <WH8248> to give drink עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> to my people בְחִירִֽי׃ <WH972> my chosen
עַם־ <WH5971> people זוּ֙ <WH2098> This יָצַ֣רְתִּי <WH3335> have I formed לִ֔י תְּהִלָּתִ֖י <WH8416> my praise יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH5608> for myself they shall shew forth ס

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not אֹתִ֥י <WH853> קָרָ֖אתָ <WH7121> But thou hast not called יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> upon me O Jacob כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָגַ֥עְתָּ <WH3021> but thou hast been weary בִּ֖י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of me O Israel

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הֵבֵ֤יאתָ <WH935> Thou hast not brought לִּי֙ שֵׂ֣ה <WH7716> me the small cattle עֹלֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH5930> of thy burnt offerings וּזְבָחֶ֖יךָ <WH2077> me with thy sacrifices לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor כִבַּדְתָּ֑נִי <WH3513> neither hast thou honoured לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor הֶעֱבַדְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH5647> I have not caused thee to serve בְּמִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> with an offering וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor הוֹגַעְתִּ֖יךָ <WH3021> nor wearied בִּלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3828> thee with incense

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor קָנִ֨יתָ <WH7069> Thou hast bought לִּ֤י בַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> with money קָנֶ֔ה <WH7070> me no sweet cane וְחֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> me with the fat זְבָחֶ֖יךָ <WH2077> of thy sacrifices לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor הִרְוִיתָ֑נִי <WH7301> neither hast thou filled אַ֗ךְ <WH389> Rather הֶעֱבַדְתַּ֙נִי֙ <WH5647> but thou hast made me to serve בְּחַטֹּאותֶ֔יךָ <WH2403> with thy sins הוֹגַעְתַּ֖נִי <WH3021> thou hast wearied בַּעֲוֹנֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5771> me with thine iniquities ס

אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> I אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I ה֛וּא <WH1931> who מֹחֶ֥ה <WH4229> I [even] I [am] he that blotteth out פְשָׁעֶ֖יךָ <WH6588> thy transgressions לְמַעֲנִ֑י <WH4616> sake וְחַטֹּאתֶ֖יךָ <WH2403> thy sins לֹ֥א <WH3808> and I will not אֶזְכֹּֽר׃ <WH2142> for mine own sake and will not remember

הַזְכִּירֵ֕נִי <WH2142> Put me in remembrance נִשָּׁפְטָ֖ה <WH8199> let us plead יָ֑חַד <WH3162> together סַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> declare אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of תִּצְדָּֽק׃ <WH6663> thou that thou mayest be justified
אָבִ֥יךָ <WH1> father הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> Thy first חָטָ֑א <WH2398> hath sinned וּמְלִיצֶ֖יךָ <WH3887> and thy teachers פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <WH6586> have transgressed בִֽי׃

וַאֲחַלֵּ֖ל <WH2490> Therefore I have profaned שָׂ֣רֵי <WH8269> the princes קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <WH5414> and have given לַחֵ֙רֶם֙ <WH2764> to the curse יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel לְגִדּוּפִֽים׃ <WH1421> to reproaches ס
